name: BroKen (Adrien Marchello)
description:
BroKen is a 3D Puzzle Adventure game where you unravel the mysteries of the mythical broken katana, Kusanagi.

We play Ryoko, he never knew his father. He finds a strange broken katana with elemental powers. So he embarks on a journey to find answers and if possible, find his own father. The kanata allows him to see mystical creatures, the yokai. Helping the most harmless and escaping the most threatening, Ryoko will meet Tsukuyomi, the Moon God. Touching revelations will be made to him at the end of this adventure.

This was my first end-of-year project and a really interesting project to work on.
We had more than a month to produce this vertical slice of the game.
